org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Class AeStorageConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeStorageConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSQLConfig, AeXMLDBConfig
public abstract class AeStorageConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a base for the SQL and Tamino config classes. It abstracts out the work of loading DB statements (SQL or XQuery) from a config file. The config files for the SQL and Tamino layers are very similar - this file contains the common logic for loading those files.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeStorageConfig.AeFilenameClassTuple
          This internal class is used by the getStatementConfigFilenames method to return a list of (filename, class-for-loading) pairs.

reload

public void reload(java.util.Map aOverrides)
Reloads the config with the new overrides which will replace any previously defined overrides.

reload

protected void reload()
Reloads the statements from the config file. This should be overridden by subclasses so they can reload from their own files.

getStatement

public java.lang.String getStatement(java.lang.String aKey)
Gets a statement given a key (the name of the statement as configured in the file).

Parameters:

Returns:
A statement.

loadStatements

protected void loadStatements()
Loads the SQL statements into the hashmap. This method loads two different XML configuration files. First it loads the common SQL configuration file, followed by the database specific SQL configuration file.

Adds the map to the map of the statements and replaces any constants in the map added.

loadStatements

protected java.util.Map loadStatements(java.lang.String aResourceName,
                                       java.lang.Class aClassForLoading)
This method does the work of parsing the configuration file and loading all of the SQL statements into the hash map.

Parameters:
aResourceName - The name of the configuration file to load (as a resource).
Returns:
A map of statement names to statements.

loadStatements

protected java.util.Map loadStatements(java.io.InputStream aStream)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Given an input stream, this method uses a SAX parser to parse through the XML document to pull out the SQL statements.

Parameters:
aStream - An open input stream that points to the XML document.
Returns:
A map of SQL statement names to SQL statements.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

resolveToken

private java.lang.String resolveToken(java.lang.String aToken)
Resolves a token with its constant value. The override map is consulted first for a value and then the constants map.

Parameters:
aToken -
Returns:
String or null indicating that the no value was found

getStatementConfigFilenames

protected abstract java.util.List getStatementConfigFilenames()
Returns a list of DB resource config filenames. Each file will be loaded and the statements found therein will be loaded into the statement map.
